Date: Thursday, 2/2/1993
Subject: Fan Reaction
Hello Boss,
The fans are not happy that you let Carney Lansford go.
The overall fan interest decreases noticeably.

Sincerly,
Your PR Director

Date: Monday, 5/1/1993
Subject: Status of Tony Tarasco
Dear Sir,
Tony Tarasco has an AVG of .073 at AA Columbia Fireflies!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director
